title: BS on "Reform"

embed.description: TLDR: Our player behavior philosophies include punishment, reform and positive reinforcement. With rewards, we have to be careful to design systems that don't simply incentivize positive behavior for a small duration, but provide reasons to stay positive all the time. Hello again!

body:
I call bull** on the "Reform" complete bulls**t. Once you have been marked for either chat abuse or afking ( no matter why, just reported enough by other players ) There is no "reform" there's just harsher penalties, even for not committing another offence. Just being reported by other vindictive players, which are no NO short supply.

What incentives do you have for reforming? How do you help this, by lumping the people together? That's worse, that's exactly what the U.S. prison system and the war on drugs did.

Get real... honestly

**** 
If you were serious about player behaviour reform you would make it possible.
